5. Christians and the Production of Liquor- 
                         Making Products 


     Many who would hesitate to place liquor to a neighbor's lips, will engage in the raising of hops, and thus lend their influence against the temperance cause. I cannot see how, in the light of the law of God, Christians can conscientiously engage in the raising of hops or in the manufacture of wine and cider for the market.--Christian Temperance and Bible Hygiene, page 32.
